CREATE TABLE reservation_paiement_paiement (
    "id" bigint NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY, 
    "montant_paiement" numeric(8, 2) NULL, 
    "date_paiement" date NULL, 
    "statut" boolean NULL, 
    "id_mode_paiement_id" bigint NULL, 
    "id_tarification_id" bigint NOT NULL, 
    "id_user_id" integer NOT NULL
);
ALTER TABLE "reservation_paiement_paiement" 
    ADD CONSTRAINT "reservation_paiement_id_mode_paiement_id_3f5eb7ae_fk_reservati" 
    FOREIGN KEY ("id_mode_paiement_id") 
    REFERENCES "reservation_paiement_mode_paiement" ("id") 
    DEFERRABLE INITIALLY DEFERRED;
ALTER TABLE "reservation_paiement_paiement" 
    ADD CONSTRAINT "reservation_paiement_id_tarification_id_21681879_fk_tarificat" 
    FOREIGN KEY ("id_tarification_id") 
    REFERENCES "tarification_tarification" ("id") 
    DEFERRABLE INITIALLY DEFERRED;
ALTER TABLE "reservation_paiement_paiement" 
    ADD CONSTRAINT "reservation_paiement_id_user_id_669e7ac9_fk_auth_user" 
    FOREIGN KEY ("id_user_id") 
    REFERENCES "auth_user" ("id") 
    DEFERRABLE INITIALLY DEFERRED;
CREATE INDEX "reservation_paiement_paiement_id_mode_paiement_id_3f5eb7ae" 
    ON "reservation_paiement_paiement" ("id_mode_paiement_id");
CREATE INDEX "reservation_paiement_paiement_id_tarification_id_21681879" 
    ON "reservation_paiement_paiement" ("id_tarification_id");
CREATE INDEX "reservation_paiement_paiement_id_user_id_669e7ac9" 
    ON "reservation_paiement_paiement" ("id_user_id");
COMMIT;
